meanings.sent1: The shy student balked at giving a presentation in front of the class.
meanings.sent2: The horse balked at jumping over the high fence.
meanings.sent3: The cat balked at going outside in the rain.
meanings.sent4: The car balked at starting on the cold winter morning.
meanings.sent5: She balked at trying the exotic food at the restaurant.

meanings.sent1: The fallen tree created a balked path through the forest.
meanings.sent2: The closed road was a balked route to the destination.
meanings.sent3: The heavy traffic balked the commuters' journey home.
meanings.sent4: The construction site was a balked area for pedestrians.
meanings.sent5: The locked gate balked their entry into the garden.

meanings.sent1: The bad weather balked their plans for a picnic.
meanings.sent2: The strict rules balked their attempts to bend them.
meanings.sent3: The broken elevator balked their quick exit from the building.
meanings.sent4: The lack of funds balked their dream of traveling the world.
meanings.sent5: The loud noise balked their concentration during the test.
